loris_qc_status.Description: Pass Fail mapping from UCSD QC JSON file

loris_selected.Description: Whether the file is selected for further processing

site.Description: Site where the session data was collected

age.Description: Age (in years) of the candidate at the time of the scan

gestational_age.Description: Gestational age (in days) based on the EDD

head_size.Description: Head size at the time of the scan

nrev.Description: Number of reviewers for manual QC

revdisp.Description: Whether there was disparity / disagreement between reviewers

QC.Description: Overall manual QC score of 1 (pass) or 0 (fail)

notes.Description: Optional notes associated with manual quality control review

QU_motion.Description: Qualitative manual QC score for motion

QU_sus.Description: Qualitative manual QC score for susceptibility artifact

QU_cutoff.Description: Qualitative manual QC score for FOV cutoff artifact

QU_line.Description: Qualitative manual QC score for line artifact

line_nframes.Description: Number of frames with line artifacts

line_max_score.Description: Maximum line artifact score across frames

line_mean_score.Description: Average line artifact score in frames with line artifacts

line_max_count.Description: Maximum line artifact count across frames

line_mean_count.Description: Average line artifact count in frames with line artifacts

cutoff.Description: Sum of dorsal and ventral cutoff scores

brain_mean.Description: Average image intensity within brain mask

brain_std.Description: Standard deviation of image intensity within brain mask

brain_SNR.Description: Signal-to-noise ratio (mean/stdev) of image intensity within brain mask

brain_min.Description: Minimum image intensity within brain mask

brain_max.Description: Maximum image intensity within brain mask

brain_median.Description: Median image intensity within brain mask

brain_tSNR_mean.Description: Average temporal SNR in brain mask

brain_tSNR_median.Description: Median temporal SNR in brain mask

brain_tSNR_std.Description: Standard deviation temporal SNR in brain mask

subthresh_02.Description: Number of seconds with framewise displacement less than 0.2 mm

subthresh_03.Description: Number of seconds with framewise displacement less than 0.3 mm

subthresh_04.Description: Number of seconds with framewise displacement less than 0.4 mm

aqc_motion.Description: Automated QC motion score for sMRI

fwhm_x.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in x-axis (left-right)

b0_median.Description: Median b=0 intensity in brain mask

b0_std.Description: Standard deviation of b=0 intensity in brain mask

DTerr_mean.Description: Average across frames of RMS residual error relative to RMS signal in brain voxels

DTerr_median.Description: Median across frames of RMS residual error relative to RMS signal in brain voxels

DTerr_std.Description: Standard deviation across frames of RMS residual error relative to RMS signal in brain voxels

Completed.Description: Whether the series has the expected number of files

HBCD_compliant.Description: Whether the series passes a minimal protocol compliance check

AdditionalInfo.Description: Notes related to classification and protocol compliance

MD_std.Description: Standard deviation of mean diffusivity in brain mask

b0_mean.Description: Average b=0 intensity in brain mask

FA_std.Description: Standard deviation of fractional anisotropy in brain mask

MD_mean.Description: Average mean diffusivity in brain mask

MD_median.Description: Median mean diffusivity in brain mask

max_nbad_frames_per_slice.Description: Maximum number of outlier frames per slice

max_nbad_slices_per_frame.Description: Maximum number of outlier slices per frame

FA_mean.Description: Average fractional anisotropy in brain mask

FA_median.Description: Median fractional anisotropy in brain mask

fwhm_z.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in z-axis (inferior-superior)

nbad_frame_slices.Description: Number of outlier frame-slices for dMRI

nbad_frames.Description: Number of frames with outlier slices for dMRI

nbad_slices.Description: Number of slices with outlier frames for dMRI

fwhm_y.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in y-axis (anterior-posterior)

qc_status.Description: Whether review is pending, complete, or has other status

ngood_frames.Description: Number of frames without outlier slices for dMRI

censor_thresh.Description: Threshold used for censoring outlier slices for dMRI

nbad_frame_slices_b0.Description: Number of outlier frame-slices for dMRI b=0 frames

nbad_frames_b0.Description: Number of frames with outlier slices for dMRI b=0 frames

nbad_slices_b0.Description: Number of slices with outlier frames for dMRI b=0 frames

ngood_frames_b0.Description: Number of frames without outlier slices for dMRI b=0 frames

nbad_frame_slices_b500.Description: Number of outlier frame-slices for dMRI b=500 frames

nbad_frames_b500.Description: Number of frames with outlier slices for dMRI b=500 frames

nbad_slices_b500.Description: Number of slices with outlier frames for dMRI b=500 frames

ngood_frames_b500.Description: Number of frames without outlier slices for dMRI b=500 frames

nbad_frame_slices_b1000.Description: Number of outlier frame-slices for dMRI b=1000 frames

nbad_frames_b1000.Description: Number of frames with outlier slices for dMRI b=1000 frames

nbad_slices_b1000.Description: Number of slices with outlier frames for dMRI b=1000 frames

ngood_frames_b1000.Description: Number of frames without outlier slices for dMRI b=1000 frames

nbad_frame_slices_b2000.Description: Number of outlier frame-slices for dMRI b=2000 frames

nbad_frames_b2000.Description: Number of frames with outlier slices for dMRI b=2000 frames

nbad_slices_b2000.Description: Number of slices with outlier frames for dMRI b=2000 frames

ngood_frames_b2000.Description: Number of frames without outlier slices for dMRI b=2000 frames

nbad_frame_slices_b3000.Description: Number of outlier frame-slices for dMRI b=3000 frames

nbad_frames_b3000.Description: Number of frames with outlier slices for dMRI b=3000 frames

nbad_slices_b3000.Description: Number of slices with outlier frames for dMRI b=3000 frames

ngood_frames_b3000.Description: Number of frames without outlier slices for dMRI b=3000 frames

FWHMx_b0.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in x-axis (left-right) for b=0 frames

FWHMy_b0.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in y-axis (anterior-posterior) for b=0 frames

FWHMz_b0.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in z-axis (inferior-superior) for b=0 frames

FWHMx_b500.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in x-axis (left-right) for b=500 frames

FWHMy_b500.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in y-axis (anterior-posterior) for b=500 frames

FWHMz_b500.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in z-axis (inferior-superior) for b=500 frames

FWHMx_b1000.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in x-axis (left-right) for b=1000 frames

FWHMy_b1000.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in y-axis (anterior-posterior) for b=1000 frames

FWHMz_b1000.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in z-axis (inferior-superior) for b=1000 frames

FWHMx_b2000.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in x-axis (left-right) for b=2000 frames

FWHMy_b2000.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in y-axis (anterior-posterior) for b=2000 frames

FWHMz_b2000.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in z-axis (inferior-superior) for b=2000 frames

FWHMx_b3000.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in x-axis (left-right) for b=3000 frames

FWHMy_b3000.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in y-axis (anterior-posterior) for b=3000 frames

FWHMz_b3000.Description: Full width half max spatial smoothness in z-axis (inferior-superior) for b=3000 frames

tSNR_b0.Description: Median temporal SNR in brain mask for b=0 frames

tSNR_b500.Description: Median temporal SNR in brain mask for b=500 frames

tSNR_b1000.Description: Median temporal SNR in brain mask for b=1000 frames

tSNR_b2000.Description: Median temporal SNR in brain mask for b=2000 frames

tSNR_b3000.Description: Median temporal SNR in brain mask for b=3000 frames

DTerr_rel_b0.Description: Median across brain voxels of DTI RMS residual error for b=0 frames relative to within-voxel RMS b=0 signal

RSIerr_rel_b0.Description: Median across brain voxels of RSI RMS residual error for b=0 frames relative to within-voxel RMS b=0 signal

DTerr_rel_b500.Description: Median across brain voxels of DTI RMS residual error for b=500 frames relative to within-voxel RMS b=0 signal

RSIerr_rel_b500.Description: Median across brain voxels of RSI RMS residual error for b=500 frames relative to within-voxel RMS b=0 signal

DTerr_rel_b1000.Description: Median across brain voxels of DTI RMS residual error for b=1000 frames relative to within-voxel RMS b=0 signal

RSIerr_rel_b1000.Description: Median across brain voxels of RSI RMS residual error for b=1000 frames relative to within-voxel RMS b=0 signal

DTerr_rel_b2000.Description: Median across brain voxels of DTI RMS residual error for b=2000 frames relative to within-voxel RMS b=0 signal

RSIerr_rel_b2000.Description: Median across brain voxels of RSI RMS residual error for b=2000 frames relative to within-voxel RMS b=0 signal

DTerr_rel_b3000.Description: Median across brain voxels of DTI RMS residual error for b=3000 frames relative to within-voxel RMS b=0 signal

RSIerr_rel_b3000.Description: Median across brain voxels of RSI RMS residual error for b=3000 frames relative to within-voxel RMS b=0 signal

DTerr_rel.Description: Median across brain voxels of DTI RMS residual error for all frames relative to within-voxel RMS signal

RSIerr_rel.Description: Median across brain voxels of RSI RMS residual error for all frames relative to within-voxel RMS signal

NumberOfFilesMissing.Description: Number of DICOM files apparently missing (based on gaps in InstanceNumbers)

brain_nvox_max.Description: Number of voxels within brain mask at maximum image intensity

brain_fvox_max.Description: Fraction of voxels within brain mask at maximum image intensity

nonbrain_mean.Description: Average image intensity outside brain mask

nonbrain_std.Description: Standard deviation of image intensity outside brain mask

nonbrain_SNR.Description: Signal-to-noise ratio (mean/stdev) of image intensity outside brain mask

NumberOfFilesOrig.Description: Number of DICOM files received (before excluding non-image, corrupt, or extra files)

NumberOfFilesExtra.Description: Number of extra DICOM files received (non-image, corrupt, or extra files)
